name: Broken Sword 2.5 - Return of the Templars
name_original: Broken Sword 2.5 - Return of the Templars
description:
Broken Sword 2.5 - Return of the Templars is an adventure game developed by mindFactory. It came out on 28-09-2008. mindFactory published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Broken Sword 2.5 - Return of the Templars on PC.
